thread.title: Jake Tapper's Brutal Truth For the Iranian Foreign Minister
thread.title_full: Jake Tapper's Brutal Truth For the Iranian Foreign Minister

author: Ericka Andersen
title: Jake Tapper's Brutal Truth For the Iranian Foreign Minister
text:
22 PM 
After the Iranian Foreign Minister tweeted this: Proud of cast & crew of “The Salesman” for Oscar & stance against #MuslimBan . Iranians have represented culture & civilization for millennia — Javad Zarif (@JZarif) February 27, 2017 
Jake Tapper had a few things to say in response: A few words about this tweet by the Iranian foreign minister… https://t.co/f2pqbW8FMs — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 2/Iran regularly jails its filmmakers. Such as Keywan Karimi guilty of “insulting sanctities” in October 2015. — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 3/Jafar Panahi was sentenced to six years in prison for trying to make an “antiregime” documentary https://t.co/JBtg9KE86b — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 4/Documentary filmmaker/women’s rights activist Mahnaz Mohammadi was jailed for collaborating with the BBC. https://t.co/6D6fzRsrte — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 5/ Musician Mehdi Rajabjan and filmmaker Hossein Rajabian were jailed for “insulting Islamic sanctities” https://t.co/7CWpcUU65b — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 6/ So FM @JZarif ? The traditions of your brilliant people are being oppressed by the tyranny of your government. Tweets notwithstanding — Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 27, 2017 
Any questions?
